config.item: Exploring community pharmacists-champions motivations for professional services in Australian community pharmacy

item.note: All questions marked with an * are {{{b}}}required.{{{/b}}}

item.label: 1. Thinking about the pharmacy where you spent the most time in the last 14 days: On average, how many prescriptions does this pharmacy dispense in a day?

item.input: MedsCheck;;;Diabetes MedsCheck;;;Immunisations (except COVID-19 vaccinations);;;COVID-19 vaccinations;;;Dose administration aids;;;Opioid substitution;;;Take-home naloxone medication service;;;Blood pressure measurement;;;Absence from work certificates;;;Weight management;;;Wound care;;;Wound care;;;Other service (please specify)
item.label: 2. Thinking about the pharmacy where you spent the most time in the last 14 days: What professional pharmacist services were you involved in?
item.note: Please select from the following options, mutliple responses possible

item.label: If you selected Other, please specify below

item.input: Pharmacy Owner;;;Senior pharmacist/Pharmacist manager;;;Pharmacist (dispensing, professional services, compounding, etc);;;Other service (please specify)
item.label: 3. Who decides on the services to be implemented in this pharmacy?
item.note: Please select from the following options, mutliple responses possible

item.label: If you selected Other, please specify below

item.input: Yes, formally, it is in their contract;;;Yes, informally, it is one pharmacist responsible for all pharmacy services delivery;;;Yes, informally, that is the pharmacist on duty;;;No, the service is not assigned to anyone;;;Other (please specify)
item.label: 4. For the services provided in the pharmacy, are any of the pharmacy staff members assigned to be 'in charge' of a service/s?
If you selected Other, please specify below
5. What, in your opinion, are the barriers to pharmacists delivery of successful professional services?
8. Did you obtain your initial pharmacist qualifications in Australia?

item.input: AACP or Australian Association of Consultant Pharmacists accreditation;;;Diabetes Educator;;;Immunisation training;;;Mental Health training;;;Compounding course;;;Other (please specify);;;None;;;Prefer not to say
item.label: 9. Which of the following additional qualifications do you hold?
item.note: You can select more than one option

item.label: If you selected Other, please specify below
